name: The Ploshers
description:
The Ploshers are a pair of intergalactic exterminators. With the ability to change color and machine gun horns, they will do the job.
A retro style game that will force you to have quick reflexes.
40 stages.
40 different enemies and traps.
3 levels of difficulty.
1 or 2 players.
50 achievements.
Keyboard and Xbox controller or compatible.
Frantic action and lots of fun.
Download and play the demo to ensure compatibility and performance.
